name: Pea Salad With Pimentos and Cheese
author: Dean
summary: This is a quick and easy - and tasty - recipe that was a standard at my extended family's special dinners. Great Aunt Betty almost always brought this as a dish to pass, and it was always gone by the end of dinner.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) jar pimento peppers, drained and chopped
½ pound Colby cheese, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
directions: Mix peas, pimento peppers, Colby cheese, onion, mayonnaise, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl with a lid
Cover and refrigerate for at least 12 hours before serving for best flavor; stir again before serving
